title: 'Not very great'
body: Superior quality tapes are available in the market. This tape doesn't hold anything, not even a single tube balloon. Very poor quality. Not very transparent like other magic tapes available in the market.

title: 'Best in class product'
body: No complains, 3M products never disappoint me. The tape has a smooth matte finish, is easy to use, and almost invisible. Good quality, worth every penny.  P.S- if you are looking for scotch tapes that tear easily, then don't get this as it won't tear away easily. But I anyway use the dispenser that comes along with it so it works well for me.
